column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Karishma - Thank you very much for the stars. I'm very pleased to know you enjoyed our ramen and that you were seated expeditiously. Sometimes we have large parties that will arrive complete
column2: but when it's time to walk to the table
column3: they are suddenly incomplete -- it happens
column5: but our firm policy is that we can't seat incomplete parties.
